```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Report for clustering as part of manual annotation at fraction level.

#### Load libraries, source code 

```{r load,  message = FALSE}
library(DropletUtils, quietly = TRUE) 
library(scater, quietly = TRUE) 
library(scuttle, quietly = TRUE) 
library(scran, quietly = TRUE) 
library(tidyverse, quietly = TRUE) 
library(dendextend, quietly = TRUE) 
library(factoextra, quietly = TRUE) 
library(pheatmap, quietly = TRUE) 
library(bluster, quietly = TRUE)
library(pheatmap, quietly = TRUE)
library(RColorBrewer, quietly = TRUE)
library(phateR, quietly = TRUE)
set.seed(37)
```

```{r}
sce_09 <- readRDS(file = snakemake@input[["sce_09"]])
sce_10 <- readRDS(file = snakemake@input[["sce_10"]])
sce_11 <- readRDS(file = snakemake@input[["sce_11"]])
sce_12 <- readRDS(file = snakemake@input[["sce_12"]])
fraction_curr <- sce_12$Fraction_ID[1]

sce_12$cluster_hierarchical <- sce_10$cluster_hierarchical
sce_12$cluster_seurat <- sce_11$cluster_seurat
sce_12$cluster_seurat_resolution <- sce_11$cluster_seurat_resolution

# check if cluster labels can just be transferred
print(ncol(sce_12))
print(tail(match(colnames(sce_12), colnames(sce_10))))
print(tail(match(colnames(sce_12), colnames(sce_11))))

number_k <- snakemake@params[["number_k"]]
number_k_curr <- number_k[[fraction_curr]]

color_tables <- snakemake@params[["color_tables"]]

```

```{r}
source(file = "../source/colors.R")
source(file = "../source/plotting.R")
source(file = "../source/sce_functions.R")
```

```{r}

sce_09 <- factor_reference_cts(sce_09)
sce_12 <- factor_reference_cts(sce_12)

if(fraction_curr == "hsc"){
  col_cts["unassigned"] <- "lightcyan3"
}else if(fraction_curr == "str"){
  col_cts["unassigned"] <- "mistyrose3"
}

col_cts_baccin <- col_cts[match(levels(sce_12$baccin_celltype_scmapclust), 
                                names(col_cts))]
col_cts_dahlin <- col_cts[match(levels(sce_12$baccin_celltype_scmapclust), 
                                names(col_cts))]
col_cts_dolgalev <- col_cts[match(levels(sce_12$baccin_celltype_scmapclust),
                                  names(col_cts))]

col_batch_exp_day <- col_alp[names(col_alp) %in% sce_12$Batch_exp_day]
col_batch_seq <- col_num[names(col_num) %in% sce_12$Batch_sequencing]
col_ann_age <- col_ann[names(col_ann) %in% sce_12$Age_ID]
col_ann_fraction <- col_ann[names(col_ann) %in% sce_12$Fraction_ID]
col_species <- col_spc[names(col_spc) %in% sce_12$Species_ID]

col_clust_h <- col_num[names(col_num) %in% sce_12$cluster_hierarchical]
col_clust_s <- col_num[names(col_num) %in% sce_12$cluster_seurat]
col_clust_l <- col_num[names(col_num) %in% sce_12$cluster_louvain]

```

Annotations for reference.

```{r}

identity_plots <- function(sce){
  
  plot_1 <- umap_base(sce, color_by = "baccin_celltype_scmapclust")+ # own function
    ggtitle(paste0(fraction_curr))+
    scale_color_manual("baccin_celltype_scmapclust", values = col_cts_baccin)
  plot_1l <- umap_legend(sce, color_by = "baccin_celltype_scmapclust")+
    scale_color_manual("baccin_celltype_scmapclust", values = col_cts_baccin)
  legend_1 <- get_legend(plot_1l)

  plot_2 <- umap_base(sce, color_by = "dahlin_celltype_scmapclust")+
    ggtitle(paste0(fraction_curr))+
    scale_color_manual("dahlin_celltype_scmapclust", values = col_cts_dahlin)
  plot_2l <- umap_legend(sce, color_by = "dahlin_celltype_scmapclust")+
    scale_color_manual("dahlin_celltype_scmapclust", values = col_cts_dahlin)
  legend_2 <- get_legend(plot_2l)
  
  plot_3 <- umap_base(sce, color_by = "dolgalev_celltype_scmapclust")+ 
    ggtitle(paste0(fraction_curr))+
    scale_color_manual("dolgalev_celltype_scmapclust",
                       values = col_cts_dolgalev)
  plot_3l <- umap_legend(sce, color_by = "dolgalev_celltype_scmapclust")+
    scale_color_manual("dolgalev_celltype_scmapclust", 
                       values = col_cts_dolgalev)
  legend_3 <- get_legend(plot_3l)
  
  PLOT_1 <- ggarrange(plot_1, legend_1)
  PLOT_2 <- ggarrange(plot_2, legend_2)
  PLOT_3 <- ggarrange(plot_3, legend_3)

  return(list(PLOT_1, PLOT_2, PLOT_3))
}

identity_plots <- identity_plots(sce_12)

```

## Silhouette and Purity

From http://bioconductor.org/books/3.16/OSCA.advanced/clustering-redux.html

```{r}

# Silhouette 
sil_approx <- approxSilhouette(reducedDim(sce_12, "PCA"), 
                               clusters = sce_12$cluster_hierarchical)

sil_data <- as.data.frame(sil_approx)
sil_data$closest <- factor(ifelse(sil_data$width > 0, 
                                  sce_12$cluster_hierarchical, 
                                  sil_data$other))
sil_data$cluster <- sce_12$cluster_hierarchical

ggplot(sil_data, aes(x=cluster, y=width, colour=closest))+
  ggbeeswarm::geom_quasirandom(size = 0.1)+
  theme_classic()+
  ggtitle(paste0(fraction_curr, " ", sce_12$hierarchical_mode[1]))+
  scale_color_manual("cluster (hierarchical)", values = col_clust_h)+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  xlab("cluster (hierarchical)")+
  ylim(-1, 1)+
  ylab("Silhouette width")

ggplot(sil_data, aes(x=cluster, y=width, colour=closest))+
  ggbeeswarm::geom_quasirandom(size = 0.1)+
  theme_classic()+
  ggtitle(paste0(fraction_curr, " ", sce_12$hierarchical_mode[1]))+
  facet_grid(cols = vars(sce_12$Species_ID))+
  scale_color_manual("cluster (hierarchical)", values = col_clust_h)+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  xlab("cluster (hierarchical)")+
  ylim(-1, 1)+
  ylab("Silhouette width")

# Purity
pure_sce <- neighborPurity(reducedDim(sce_12, "PCA"), 
                           sce_12$cluster_hierarchical)
pure_data <- as.data.frame(pure_sce)
pure_data$maximum <- factor(pure_data$maximum)
pure_data$cluster <- sce_12$cluster_hierarchical

ggplot(pure_data, aes(x=cluster, y=purity, colour=maximum))+
  ggbeeswarm::geom_quasirandom(size = 0.1)+
  theme_classic()+
  ggtitle(paste0(fraction_curr, " ", sce_12$hierarchical_mode[1]))+
  scale_color_manual("cluster (hierarchical)", values = col_clust_h)+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  xlab("cluster (hierarchical)")+
  ylim(0, 1)+
  ylab("Cluster purity")

ggplot(pure_data, aes(x=cluster, y=purity, colour=maximum))+
  ggbeeswarm::geom_quasirandom(size = 0.1)+
  theme_classic()+
  ggtitle(paste0(fraction_curr, " ", sce_12$hierarchical_mode[1]))+
  facet_grid(cols = vars(sce_12$Species_ID))+
  scale_color_manual("cluster (hierarchical)", values = col_clust_h)+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  xlab("cluster (hierarchical)")+
  ylim(0, 1)+
  ylab("Cluster purity")

ggplot(pure_data, aes(x=cluster, y=purity, color=cluster))+
  geom_boxplot(outlier.size = 0.1)+
  ggtitle(paste0(fraction_curr, " ", sce_12$hierarchical_mode[1]))+
  theme_classic()+
  scale_color_manual("cluster (hierarchical)", values = col_clust_h)+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  xlab("cluster (hierarchical)")+
  ylim(0, 1)+
  ylab("Cluster purity")

ggplot(pure_data, aes(x=cluster, y=purity, color=cluster))+
  geom_boxplot(outlier.size = 0.1)+
  ggtitle(paste0(fraction_curr, " ", sce_12$hierarchical_mode[1]))+
  facet_grid(cols = vars(sce_12$Species_ID))+
  theme_classic()+
  scale_color_manual("cluster (hierarchical)", values = col_clust_h)+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  xlab("cluster (hierarchical)")+
  ylim(0, 1)+
  ylab("Cluster purity")
```

### BOTH

```{r}

mat <- reducedDim(sce_09, "PCA") # PCA is batch corrected
mat <- scale(mat)
dist <- dist(mat, method = 'euclidean')
ward <- hclust(dist, method = "ward.D2")
dend <- as.dendrogram(ward)

col_dend <- color_branches(dend, k = (number_k_curr-1), 
                               groupLabels = FALSE, col = col_clust_h)
plot(col_dend, main = paste0(fraction_curr, 
                                 " , ward.D2, k=", (number_k_curr-1)))

col_dend <- color_branches(dend, k = number_k_curr, 
                               groupLabels = FALSE, col = col_clust_h)
plot(col_dend, main = paste0(fraction_curr, 
                                 " , ward.D2, used k=", number_k_curr))
```

## Silhouette and Purity

```{r}

# Silhouette
sil.approx <- approxSilhouette(reducedDim(sce_12, "PCA"), 
                               clusters = sce_12$cluster_seurat)
sil.data <- as.data.frame(sil.approx)
sil.data$closest <- factor(ifelse(sil.data$width > 0, 
                                  sce_12$cluster_seurat, 
                                  sil.data$other))
sil.data$cluster <- sce_12$cluster_seurat

ggplot(sil.data, aes(x=cluster, y=width, colour=closest))+
  ggbeeswarm::geom_quasirandom(size = 0.1)+
  theme_classic()+
  ggtitle(paste0(fraction_curr, " ", sce_12$seurat_mode[1]))+
  scale_color_manual("cluster (seurat)", values = col_clust_s)+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  xlab("cluster (seurat)")+
  ylim(-1, 1)+
  ylab("Silhouette width")

ggplot(sil.data, aes(x=cluster, y=width, colour=closest))+
  ggbeeswarm::geom_quasirandom(size = 0.1)+
  theme_classic()+
  ggtitle(paste0(fraction_curr, " ", sce_12$seurat_mode[1]))+
  facet_grid(cols = vars(sce_12$Species_ID))+
  scale_color_manual("cluster (seurat)", values = col_clust_s)+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  xlab("cluster (seurat)")+
  ylim(-1, 1)+
  ylab("Silhouette width")

# Purity
pure_sce <- neighborPurity(reducedDim(sce_12, "PCA"), sce_12$cluster_seurat)
pure_data <- as.data.frame(pure_sce)
pure_data$maximum <- factor(pure_data$maximum)
pure_data$cluster <- sce_12$cluster_seurat

ggplot(pure_data, aes(x=cluster, y=purity, colour=maximum))+
  ggbeeswarm::geom_quasirandom(size = 0.1)+
  theme_classic()+
  ggtitle(paste0(fraction_curr, " ", sce_12$seurat_mode[1]))+
  scale_color_manual("cluster (seurat)", values = col_clust_s)+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  xlab("cluster (seurat)")+
  ylim(0, 1)+
  ylab("Cluster purity")

ggplot(pure_data, aes(x=cluster, y=purity, colour=maximum))+
  ggbeeswarm::geom_quasirandom(size = 0.1)+
  theme_classic()+
  ggtitle(paste0(fraction_curr, " ", sce_12$seurat_mode[1]))+
  facet_grid(cols = vars(sce_12$Species_ID))+
  scale_color_manual("cluster (seurat)", values = col_clust_s)+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  xlab("cluster (seurat)")+
  ylim(0, 1)+
  ylab("Cluster purity")

ggplot(pure_data, aes(x=cluster, y=purity, color=cluster))+
  geom_boxplot(outlier.size = 0.1)+
  theme_classic()+
  ggtitle(paste0(fraction_curr, " ", sce_12$seurat_mode[1]))+
  scale_color_manual("cluster (seurat)", values = col_clust_s)+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  xlab("cluster (seurat)")+
  ylim(0, 1)+
  ylab("Cluster purity")
```

## Silhouette and Purity

```{r}

# Silhouette
sil.approx <- approxSilhouette(reducedDim(sce_12, "PCA"), 
                               clusters = sce_12$cluster_louvain)
sil.data <- as.data.frame(sil.approx)
sil.data$closest <- factor(ifelse(sil.data$width > 0, 
                                  sce_12$cluster_louvain, 
                                  sil.data$other))
sil.data$cluster <- sce_12$cluster_louvain

ggplot(sil.data, aes(x=cluster, y=width, colour=closest))+
  ggbeeswarm::geom_quasirandom(size = 0.1)+
  theme_classic()+
  ggtitle(fraction_curr)+
  scale_color_manual("cluster (louvain)", values = col_clust_l)+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  xlab("cluster (louvain)")+
  ylim(-1, 1)+
  ylab("Silhouette width")

ggplot(sil.data, aes(x=cluster, y=width, colour=closest))+
  ggbeeswarm::geom_quasirandom(size = 0.1)+
  theme_classic()+
  ggtitle(fraction_curr)+
  facet_grid(cols = vars(sce_12$Species_ID))+
  scale_color_manual("cluster (louvain)", values = col_clust_l)+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  xlab("cluster (louvain)")+
  ylim(-1, 1)+
  ylab("Silhouette width")

# Purity
pure_sce <- neighborPurity(reducedDim(sce_12, "PCA"), sce_12$cluster_louvain)
pure_data <- as.data.frame(pure_sce)
pure_data$maximum <- factor(pure_data$maximum)
pure_data$cluster <- sce_12$cluster_louvain

ggplot(pure_data, aes(x=cluster, y=purity, colour=maximum))+
  ggbeeswarm::geom_quasirandom(size = 0.1)+
  theme_classic()+
  ggtitle(fraction_curr)+
  scale_color_manual("cluster (louvain)", values = col_clust_l)+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  xlab("cluster (louvain)")+
  ylim(0, 1)+
  ylab("Cluster purity")

ggplot(pure_data, aes(x=cluster, y=purity, colour=maximum))+
  ggbeeswarm::geom_quasirandom(size = 0.1)+
  theme_classic()+
  ggtitle(fraction_curr)+
  facet_grid(cols = vars(sce_12$Species_ID))+
  scale_color_manual("cluster (louvain)", values = col_clust_l)+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  xlab("cluster (louvain)")+
  ylim(0, 1)+
  ylab("Cluster purity")

ggplot(pure_data, aes(x=cluster, y=purity, color=cluster))+
  geom_boxplot(outlier.size = 0.1)+
  theme_classic()+
  ggtitle(fraction_curr)+
  scale_color_manual("cluster (louvain)", values = col_clust_l)+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  xlab("cluster (louvain)")+
  ylim(0, 1)+
  ylab("Cluster purity")

ggplot(pure_data, aes(x=cluster, y=purity, color=cluster))+
  geom_boxplot(outlier.size = 0.1)+
  theme_classic()+
  ggtitle(fraction_curr)+
  scale_color_manual("cluster (louvain)", values = col_clust_l)+
  facet_grid(cols = vars(sce_12$Species_ID))+
  theme(legend.position = "none")+
  xlab("cluster (louvain)")+
```

# Comparison of labels

## Clusters

### Seurat and Hierarchical

```{r fig.height = 10}

sce_temp <- sce_12
sce_temp$cluster_hierarchical <- paste0(sce_temp$cluster_hierarchical,
                                        "_hierarchical")
sce_temp$cluster_seurat <- paste0(sce_temp$cluster_seurat, "_seurat")

mat_comp <- as.matrix(table(sce_temp$cluster_hierarchical,
                            sce_temp$cluster_seurat))

mat_comp <- mat_comp[which(rowMeans(mat_comp) > 0), 
                       which(colMeans(mat_comp) > 0)]

mat_comp_temp1 <- mat_comp
for(i in 1:nrow(mat_comp_temp1)){
  mat_comp_temp1[i,] <- mat_comp_temp1[i,]/sum(mat_comp_temp1[i,])
}

mat_comp_temp2 <- t(mat_comp)
for(i in 1:nrow(mat_comp_temp2)){
  mat_comp_temp2[i,] <- mat_comp_temp2[i,]/sum(mat_comp_temp2[i,])
}

pheatmap(mat_comp_temp1, 
         main = paste0(fraction_curr, " Seurat/Hierarchical overlap"))

pheatmap(mat_comp_temp2, 
         main = paste0(fraction_curr, " Seurat/Hierarchical overlap"))

```
